about.title: About Me
about.content: I have experience creating both simple landing pages and complex high-load applications (50+ pages) with deep performance optimization. Working as a freelancer taught me to communicate effectively with clients and work under tight deadlines. I constantly research and study information about native JS or frameworks, following trends through professional communities. I have entrepreneurial experience - offering clients solutions that increased their sales. I communicate fluently in English. I would be happy to work in a company that also loves technology.

skills.title: Skills
skills.content: JavaScript, TypeScript, React.js, Next.js, Redux, Redux Toolkit, HTML, CSS (flex, grid), Tailwind CSS, Git, REST API, Webpack, Vite, Jest, React Testing Library (RTL), ES Lint, English B2+

education.title: Education
education.content: Computer Science and Engineering 09.03.01, Bauman Moscow State Technical University

workExperience.desc:
Developed a SPA from scratch using Next.js (50+ pages): SSR/SSG for SEO, dynamic routes, multilingual support (i18n).
Key implementations: role-based authorization system with JWT, video platform with custom player, interactive dashboards with charts (Chart.js).
Performance optimization: reduced TTI by 35% through code splitting + lazy loading, decreased bundle size by 30% (analysis via Webpack Bundle Analyzer), configured API request caching (SWR).
Processes and collaboration: set up CI/CD (GitHub Actions), close work with CEO: proposed business logic solutions (increased conversion by 20%), received an offer to become a co-owner of the product for significant contributions.
workExperience.stack: Next.js, React, TypeScript, Redux Toolkit, Redux Thunk, MUI, CSS Modules

workExperience.desc:
Developed interfaces for a dormitory management system.
Key tasks: worked in a team of 3 frontend developers (code review, git flow), refactored legacy code, implemented TypeScript, configured dev/prod environment separation.
workExperience.stack: React, JavaScript/TypeScript, Redux, Prime React, SCSS, GitLab CI

nonCommercialExperience.stack: Vue 2/3, React, Redux, Effector, Zustand, Tailwind..
